summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Five Thousand Dollars from the General Fund of the City of Seattle, as a temporary loan to the Local Improvement District No. 3005, Ordinance No. 36184, for the improvement of Forty-seventh Avenue Southwest, et al, said money to be used by the Board of Public Works for the said Ordinance No. 36184, and to be repaid to the general fund from the first moneys belonging to said district and available for that purpose.
